verses.text:
The good news is sounding, The trumpet is blowing,
The year of jubilee, The year of jubilee;
Free grace is flowing, Free grace is flowing,
The year of jubilee, The year of jubilee.

A day when Jesus' song, A day when Jesus' song,
Is flowing sweet and clear, Is flowing sweet and clear;
When grace shall ring and loud, When grace shall ring and loud,
The year of jubilee, The year of jubilee.

And now the Savior calls, And now the Savior calls,
The time is drawing near, The time is drawing near;
Just washed of guilty, Just washed of guilty,
The year of jubilee, The year of jubilee.

chorus.text:
Jubilee, jubilee,
The year of jubilee;
Jubilee, jubilee,
The year of jubilee.
